title: Terraform 3-Tier Architecture
description: Build a production-ready 3-tier web application infrastructure on AWS using Terraform, including VPC, ALB, EC2/ECS, and RDS with security best practices.
prerequisites: Understanding of VPCs, subnets, security groups
skills_learned: VPC design with public, private, and isolated subnets
Application Load Balancer with target groups and health checks
EC2 instances with user data scripts
